record.dc:title: 26BY11 Rymer Site 15BY11, Bradley Co., TN. Feature 6, Showing cross section of wall postmolds on northwest and southwest sides. Semi-subterranean structure. Direction west.
record.wpa:narrative: Semi-subterranean structure with central fire basins and entrance (SE corner). Numerous post molds and thickness - 0.1' - 0.4', of detritus packed on floor indicate long period of occupation. Structure burned as evidenced by charred posts and wattle to SE and surrounding firebasin. Hard baked floor mainly under wattle. Dendrochronology specimen #1. See special ground plat for scale drawing.
